DOC.brief_title: The Effects Differing Cognitive Task Demands Whole-body Energy Metabolism Cerebral Blood-flow : Modulation Multivitamins/Minerals Coenzyme Q10
DOC.detailed_description: Vitamins , mineral CoQ10 , exert number physiological effect directly relevant energy supply metabolism . Therefore hypothesize nutritional intervention trial facilitate brain metabolic substrate distribution utilisation demand brain activity potential benefit task performance . This pilot , double-blind , placebo control , 3-arm parallel group trial utilise two concomitant non-invasive technique : - Near Infrared Spectroscopy ( NIRS ) - Indirect Calorimetry ( ICa ) . The NIRS utilised measure rate delivery metabolic substrate ( via cerebral blood flow i.e . concentration total-haemoglobin ) oxygen extraction blood ( concentration deoxy-haemoglobin ) frontal cortex brain cognitive task . The ICa calculate exhale gas analysis utilised quantify overall 'energy ' cost performance task term oxygen uptake , carbon dioxide production , energy expenditure , substrate ( fat carbohydrate ) metabolism . Cognitive task differ level difficulty utilised hypothesis energy expenditure parameter blood flow/oxygen extraction increase rise task demand , treatment related effect evident condition increase neural activity . The effect mention parameter two multivitamin/multimineral preparation ( MMP ) compare placebo subsequent single dose administration ( acute ) follow daily administration eight week period ( chronic ) . The nutritional intervention expect improve nutritional status thereby facilitate energy supply metabolism positive impact study parameter . The effect nutritional intervention nutritional status evaluate measure plasma/serum concentration select subset analytes . It hypothesize nutritional status baseline eight week supplementation period impact metabolic substrate conversion , oxygen utilisation , cerebral blood flow cognitive performance .

Subjects , opinion investigator willing participate schedule visit , adhere treatment plan , trial procedure accord protocol . Subjects accept refrain alcohol intake 24 hour fast 12 hour visit . A history current diagnosis disease , use MMP might contraindicate utilisation MMP might affect ( e.g. , iron accumulation , iron utilisation disorder , hypercalcemia , hypercalciuria , impaired renal function , hypervitaminosis A , hypervitaminosis D ) . Current intake pharmaceutical ( exception oral contraceptive , routine medication treat benign condition , antibiotic treat acne ) . Habitual intake MMP dietary supplement within last 4 week ( define ≥3 consecutive day ≥4 day total per week ) . Current history drug alcohol abuse opinion investigator . Current pregnancy lactation .
